articles.title: Could this photo of juror help Chauvin's appeal? - CNN Video
articles.description: Jury consultant Alan Tuerkheimer explains why there could be grounds for appeal in Derek Chauvin's case after a photo of one of the trial jurors showed him wearing a Black Lives Matter shirt at the March on Washington.
